H0.text: Open the windows to equalize air pressure is a statement that would most likely be included in a news report about an approaching hurricane.

H1.text: Install snow tires and check the antifreeze in the car radiator is a statement that would most likely be included in a news report about an approaching hurricane.

H2.text: Evacuate low-lying areas near the coast is the statement most likely to appear in a news report about an approaching hurricane.

H3.text: Expect wind speed to decrease for the next several hours is a statement that would most likely be included in a news report about an approaching hurricane.

A4.text: Hurricane evacuation can be vital to individual safety in some circumstances

A5.text: The direction and potential danger of a hurricane may change suddenly
